meanings.definition: People who are considered to be especially well informed about a particular subject or field.
meanings.sent1: The cognoscenti of art could easily identify the famous paintings.
meanings.sent2: The fashion cognoscenti always know the latest trends.
meanings.sent3: At the wine tasting, the cognoscenti debated the merits of different vintages.
meanings.sent4: She was like a cognoscenti of music, able to recognize any song within seconds.
meanings.sent5: The cognoscenti of literature could recite entire poems from memory.

meanings.definition: A group of people who have a great deal of knowledge or expertise in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The cognoscenti in the book club had read every classic novel.
meanings.sent2: The tech cognoscenti were sought after for their advice on gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The cognoscenti of gardening shared tips on growing the biggest pumpkins.
meanings.sent4: He was a cognoscenti of cars, able to identify any model just by the sound of its engine.
meanings.sent5: The cognoscenti of cooking could whip up a gourmet meal with just a few ingredients.
